original_title: AJW Riot of the Rising Sun
overview: Itsuki Yamazaki & Noriyo Tateno vs. Yukari Omori & Ayumi Hori  Fuji TV Cup Tag League Match: Crush Gals vs. Dump Matsumoto & Crane Yu  WWWA & UWA World Title Unification Match: Jaguar Yokota vs. La Galactica. Jaguar wins UWA Title.  9/26/84 2/3 Falls '84 Tag League Final: Jaguar Yokota & Devil Masami vs. Crush Gals
title: AJW Riot of the Rising Sun
